product_name: Koleston Perfect ME+ Permanent Color Collection
description:
Koleston Perfect - Our purest Color Ever with ME+ Technology
Hair color trends are constantly moving. One week we might be talking about rose gold hair, and the next we’re taking it neon blue or paring locks back with natural-looking balayage. You could never call our industry’s goings-on uneventful, but there is one area where things tend to stay the same: in the choice of dye molecules that are used.
Until now, that is. Wella Professionals’ technical advancement soars to new heights with the introduction of KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+. It is the first and only professional hair color brand to feature breakthrough technologies, Pure Balance Technology and ME+. But, what does that mean? Let’s break it down…

The Pure Balance Technology is designed to minimize the formation of free radicals during the color formation by deactivating impurities like metals present in hair. Free radicals interfere with the color formation during the color development and are a key cause to hair damage. With Pure Balance Technology, the result is even pure color results with natural depth and shine and significantly less hair damage, color after color*.

Meanwhile, the ME+ technology is a scientific breakthrough designed to replace extreme sensitizers, PPD and PTD. ME+ considerably reduces the risk of developing a new allergy to hair color**. First patented in the 19th century, PPD and PTD had been the leading ingredients in permanent hair color for over 130 years. NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ is about to change that, offering salon clients our most meaningful change in hair color innovation in over a century.
The new formula also delivers color that is significantly more even, balanced and true to tone from root to tip** offering better balance of tone and control of depth** with up to 100% grey coverage. The vibrant color portfolio spans naturals, brunettes, reds and blondes, plus a special mixing range to make a wide array of shades possible.
NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ features the same mixing ratio, the same development time and the same grey coverage, all enhanced with easier mixing, more precise application and an improved fragrance that offers a better experience for colorists and clients.
* Versus previous Koleston Perfect. Valid for Koleston Perfect with Pure Balance Technology

** FOR THE PEOPLE NOT ALLERGIC TO HAIR COLORANTS. Although the risk of developing new allergy is reduced, there remains a risk of allergic reaction that can be severe. Always perform an Allergy Alert Test 48h before each coloration. Strictly follow safety instructions and consult www.wella.com/XYZ. If your client has ever experienced an allergic reaction to hair colorants, you should not color. ME+ is present in specific shades of Pure Naturals, Rich Naturals, Vibrant Reds, Special Blondes and Deep Browns of the Koleston Perfect brand.

Delivers up to 2X the shine*
Reduced breakage** and 100% replenished and restrengthened hair***
Nourishing protection that seals in moisture, softness, and shine for up to 30 shampoos****

Backed by 7 years of research and 7 patents*, L’Oréal scientists worked hand in hand with hairdressers around the world to create Metal Detox. Research found that copper metals absorbed into the hair can cause a higher risk of breakage and unpredictable colour results during the colouring service.

Metal Detox is a haircare innovation powered by Glicoamine. The patented technology helps to neutralize (de-activate) these excess copper metals in the hair, helping to prevent them from interfering with the colouring process.

This award-winning shampoo is the second step in our Metal Detox service which can be used on your client’s hair after the Metal Detox Pre-Treatment Spray and then followed by the mask for the best results. This shampoo was awarded best shampoo for coloured hair in the Cosmopolitan Beauty Awards 2021.

If you have curly hair, you probably love a great styling product - or two, or three, or more. And, after awhile, those products can build up on your curls, along with residue from dirt, oil, and hard or chlorinated water. The result? Dull, droopy curls that can't live up to their full, springy, shiny potential. That's when curls need the help of a clarifying shampoo. Unlike other clarifiers that can be too harsh and drying, our Water Works Clarifying Shampoo is formulated to be curl-friendly. Its gentle but powerful chelating formula uses a blend of Lemon, Grapefruit, and Orange Flower extracts to target, break down, and remove residue build-up without stripping away essential moisture. In one wash, it will help to "reboot" the curl pattern for a fresh start. Plus, it's safe to use on color-treated hair (but shouldn't be used directly after a coloring process). Curls are left clean, completely nourished, and ready for styling.

When humidity gets in, curls expand with unwanted volume and look frizzy, undefined, and dull. Our Advanced Climate Control® Detangling Spray primes curls to better resist frizz. Use it to seal every strand, fight tangles, and make curls more manageable. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to form a barrier that locks in moisture and locks out humidity. Natural oils (Grapeseed, Sweet Almond, Macadamia Nut, Coconut, Argan, and Safflower) nourish and moisturize curls, while a dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from heat styling and environmental aggressors. The result: defined, shiny, controlled curls-in any climate.

• Moisture Recovery + Curl Confidence Duo Includes: 
    • Moisture Recovery Treatment Balm
    • Curl Confidence Defining Creme

description:
It’s a 10 Silk Express Miracle Silk Smoothing Balm. Silky Straight Smooth Styles
Ideal for regular use to achieve salon-perfect results for straight styles at home, It’s a 10 Silk Express Miracle Smoothing Balm is one simple step to ultimate silkiness. Introducing New & Improved Primer & Gloss with Exclusive ProStay Technology, for one more full day of polished perfection.
Now Up to 11 days of gel-like wear and shine!.

How Does Infinite Shine Work?
The primer contains a blend of polymers solvents and plasticizers that acts as an anchor to the nail for the rest of the system.
The color contains a proprietary oligomer that begins to react once the top coat is applied and the system is exposed to natural light, forming a network of polymer chains that strengthen the color layer.
The gloss contains an oligomer and photo initiator that activates the entire system with natural light, starting a reaction in the gloss and color coat, linking the color and gloss layers together, reinforcing the entire application and locking in the shine!
Infinite Shine is a state-of-the-art system. When applied as a system, the layers work together to provide long-wear and high-shine.

So, what exactly is Bakuchiol? It’s a plant-based, vegan-friendly ingredient that offers a gentler alternative to retinol. Derived from the seeds and leaves of the psoralea corylifolia (Babchi) plant, bakuchiol is found in India. This ingredient is climbing in popularity and will hit the mass market next year, thanks to the rising plant-based beauty trend.

The original blue disinfecting brew is a hospital-grade, broad-spectrum disinfectant that is EPA-registered. Proven effective against HIV-1, Hepatitis B and Hepatitis C Complies with OSHA's bloodborne pathogens standard U.S. EPA-registered hospital-grade, broad-spectrum disinfectant Kills pseudomonas, staph and salmonella Kills fungus, including "athlete's foot" fungus Safe for acrylic tanning beds, stainless steel, plastics, combs, brushes, rollers and shears Concentrated-Mix with water to make a disinfectant solution Immerse items for 10 minutes, mop with sponge, or spray on Anti-rust formula Will not stain skin or surfaces Barbicide is the symbol of disinfection recognized throughout the world

Did you know that Barbicide Liquid can be used as a spray disinfectant and is equally effective as Barbicide Wipes plus it is really cost effective???!!! It is as simple as finding a spray bottle and mixing it up as you would for immersion! Just mix ¼ cup Barbicide concentrate in 4 cups of water – generally the amount that fits in a spray bottle. Clean the surface you want to disinfect and then spray with Barbicide spray and allow to sit (wet) for 10 minutes. Allow to air dry or wipe dry with a clean towel or paper towel. Remember to label your bottle with identifying information – you can download a label at Barbicide.com and tape to the bottle!
* The commentary of labeling the bottle as per state board that is needed for professional use for compliancy.
